A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If episode 7 was a love letter to past movies then episode 8 throws the old rules out the exhaust port. This is a beautifully directed\, written\, and acted movie. Nothing will be as you expect; Luke wasn't kidding when he said \"This isn't going to go the way you think.\" This movie is bound to be divisive\, but it moves the series in exciting new directions.\n\nGo in as blind as you can and enjoy one of the best movies of 2017!
